definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: Seeing off Carrefour or Tesco is just one of Lai's goals.
sentences.chinese: 爲家樂福或者樂購送行只是賴先生的目標之一。

sentences.english: She also said she would go to Carrefour to get some good food for them.
sentences.chinese: 還說要去家樂福給他們買好喫的慰勞一下。

sentences.english: To lean more about carrefour's mission and promoter responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 更多的瞭解家樂福的使命和促銷員的職責。

sentences.english: This system is intended to be popularized to Carrefour global branches in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 這套系統擬於2009年向家樂福全球分支機構推廣。

sentences.english: Carrefour will likely incur a small cash cost in exiting the Russian, Mr. Bouchut said.
sentences.chinese: 布旭說，家樂福退出俄羅斯將可能發生少量現金損失。

sentences.english: Some have even run through the stores trashing them.
sentences.chinese: 一些人甚至在逛家樂福時將商品扔棄在一旁。

sentences.english: That's what Wal-Mart and Carrefour were charged with by China's National Development and Reform Commission earlier this year.
sentences.chinese: 這就是今年沃爾瑪和家樂福被中國發改委指控的原因。

definition: market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
buy one, get one free/two for the price of one
where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment
